casebody.data:
James T. Cowdery, respondent, v. Samuel Keefer, et al., appellants. Decided April 7, 1884. Appeal by defendant from judgment entered on verdict of jury, for plaintiff and from order denying defendants’ motion for a new trial, made upon the judge’s minutes. Alfred C. Chapin, for appellants ; William J. Marrin, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and O’Gorman, J.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed with costs, and order appealed irom affirmed with $10 costs,
